# Bingheng Credit

> 专注帮美国债权人在中国境内合规追收B2B及离境个人债务，60%+成功率，45天平均回款

我们是唯一专注于中国债务人追收的专业机构，通过深厚的本地网络和文化理解，成功追回1.28亿美元被错误核销的债务。

## Docs
- [Services Overview](https://binghengcredit.com/services): Three core services for student housing, e-commerce, and B2B trade debt recovery
- [Recovery Process](https://binghengcredit.com/process): Six-step professional process from assessment to payment
- [Compliance Framework](https://binghengcredit.com/compliance): FDCPA and Chinese privacy law dual compliance system
- [Frequently Asked Questions](https://binghengcredit.com/#faq): 31 comprehensive Q&As covering costs, timeline, and compliance

## Services
- [Student Housing Debt](https://binghengcredit.com/services#student-housing): 65% success rate for Chinese student housing debts
- [E-commerce Platform Debt](https://binghengcredit.com/services#ecommerce): 58% success rate tracking disappeared Chinese sellers
- [B2B Trade Debt](https://binghengcredit.com/services#b2b-trade): 72% success rate resolving commercial disputes

## Company
- [About Us](https://binghengcredit.com/about): Founded 2020, Shanghai HQ with US operations team
- [Industries Served](https://binghengcredit.com/industries): Education, e-commerce, manufacturing, healthcare sectors
- [Contact](https://binghengcredit.com/contact): Free debt portfolio assessment within 24 hours
